scripts.patch: npm t && npm version patch && npm run build-client && npm publish && git push && git push --tags
scripts.minor: npm t && npm version minor && npm run build-client && npm publish && git push && git push --tags
scripts.major: npm t && npm version major && npm run build-client && npm publish && git push && git push --tags
scripts.build-client: rm -rf .vovk dist && VOVK_PREFIX=https://vovk-examples.vercel.app/api vovk generate --client-out .vovk && webpack --mode production
